## ConfigurableProductDetailQuery type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ConfigurableProductDetailQuery = {
    products?: Maybe<{
        items?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
            uid: string;
        } | {
            uid: string;
            configurable_product_options_selection?: Maybe<{
                options_available_for_selection?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
                    attribute_code: string;
                    option_value_uids: Array<Maybe<string>>;

                    disabled?: Maybe<boolean>;
                    label?: Maybe<string>;
                    position?: Maybe<number>;
                    url?: Maybe<string>;

                    disabled?: Maybe<boolean>;
                    label?: Maybe<string>;
                    position?: Maybe<number>;
                    url?: Maybe<string>;
                }>>>;

                    uid: string;
                    sku?: Maybe<string>;
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    price_range: {
                        maximum_price?: Maybe<{
                            final_price: {
                                currency?: Maybe<CurrencyEnum>;
                                value?: Maybe<number>;
                            };
                            regular_price: {
                                currency?: Maybe<CurrencyEnum>;
                                value?: Maybe<number>;
                            };
                        }>;
                        minimum_price: {
                            final_price: {
                                currency?: Maybe<CurrencyEnum>;
                                value?: Maybe<number>;
                            };
                            regular_price: {
                                currency?: Maybe<CurrencyEnum>;
                                value?: Maybe<number>;
                            };
                        };
                    };
                }>;
            }>;
            configurable_options?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
                attribute_code?: Maybe<string>;
                attribute_uid: string;
                label?: Maybe<string>;
                position?: Maybe<number>;
                uid: string;
                use_default?: Maybe<boolean>;
                values?: Maybe<Array<Maybe<{
                    label?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid?: Maybe<string>;
                    swatch_data?: Maybe<{
                        value?: Maybe<string>;
                    } | {
                        value?: Maybe<string>;
                    } | {
                        value?: Maybe<string>;
                    }>;
                }>>>;
            }>>>;
        } | {
            uid: string;
```
